tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    pollution_level FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  pollutant_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Policies (
  policy_id INT,
  policy_name VARCHAR(50),
  policy_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationEfforts (
  effort_id INT,
  effort_name VARCHAR(50),
  organization VARCHAR(50),
  funding DECIMAL(10,2),
  start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyMakers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  organization VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityEfforts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(255),
  value FLOAT,
  units VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE species_info (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  kingdom VARCHAR(50),
  family VARCHAR(50),
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_projects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE observations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  observer_name VARCHAR(255),
  observation_date DATE,
  observation_notes TEXT
)
